resources.string:
Player would be having a 5 X 5 grid visible to him/her. Numbers are written inside each block starting from 1 - 25 randomly.

 Player will take turns in telling the numbers randomly. And both players(System and Player) cross their numbers in the board. 

 For each and every row completed either horizontally or vertically or diagonally each letter in the word BINGO is highlighted. The player who completes the word BINGO first "WINS"
PRAVEEN. N \n NIKITHA . G \n ANISHA . V
